ygData.subject: RE: negativity
ygData.msgSnippet: ... miles ... situation ... Actually there is an AC burger joint and a UO buffet within walking distance of the EQ steakhouse.  We keep eating at EQ because,
ygData.messageBody:
> Date: Thu, 3 Feb 2000 14:42:29 -0700
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: negativity
>
>
> I have one comment Ariell. I can choose to go to other restaurant easily.
> If the restaurant in your example served the only edible food in 5000
miles
> I expect you would go back the very next night and every one after that.
> All the while complaining in hopes they would change. That's the
situation
> in EQ.

Actually there is an AC burger joint and a UO buffet within walking distance
of the EQ steakhouse. We keep eating at EQ because, even with all its
faults, a bad steak is better than a crappy burger.


Wayne
